@use "sass:map";
.main-header-container {
  background-color: white;
  display: block;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  height: 100vh;
}

@media (max-width: 1324px) {
  .main-header-container {
    background-position: 35% 0%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .main-header-container {
    background-position: 35% 0%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .main-header-container {
    background-size: 200%;
    background-position: 45% -0%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .main-header-container {
    background-size: 100%;
    background-position: 100% 80%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 450px) {
  .main-header-container {
    background-position: 50% 86%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }
}

.home-dog-hero {
  background-image: url("../../images/heroes/home-dog-hero-big.jpg");
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .home-dog-hero {
    background-image: url("../../images/heroes/home-dog-hero-medium.jpg");
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .home-dog-hero {
    background-image: url("../../images/heroes/home-dog-hero-mobile.jpg");
  }
}

.gallery-dog-hero {
  background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(rgba(61, 28, 28, 0.14)), to(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14))), url("../../images/heroes/gallery-dog-hero-big.jpg");
  background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(61, 28, 28, 0.14), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14)), url("../../images/heroes/gallery-dog-hero-big.jpg");
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .gallery-dog-hero {
    background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(rgba(61, 28, 28, 0.14)), to(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14))), url("../../images/heroes/gallery-dog-hero-medium.jpg");
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(61, 28, 28, 0.14), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14)), url("../../images/heroes/gallery-dog-hero-medium.jpg");
    background-size: 130em;
    background-position: 45% 100%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .gallery-dog-hero {
    background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(rgba(61, 28, 28, 0.14)), to(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14))), url("../../images/heroes/gallery-dog-hero-mobile.jpg");
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(61, 28, 28, 0.14), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14)), url("../../images/heroes/gallery-dog-hero-mobile.jpg");
    background-size: 70em;
    background-position: 50% 100%;
  }
}

.main-title {
  font-size: 5.7rem;
  font-family: "Playfair Display SC";
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 5.7rem;
  color: #707070;
  margin-bottom: 0.3125em;
}

@media (max-width: 968px) {
  .main-title {
    font-size: 4.3rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.3em;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .main-title {
    font-size: 4.3rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.3em;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .main-title {
    font-size: 3.7rem;
    text-align: left;
  }
}

.main-subtitle {
  color: #707070;
  font-family: "Playfair Display SC";
  font-size: 3.15rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  margin-bottom: 0.3125em;
}

@media (max-width: 968px) {
  .main-subtitle {
    font-size: 2.6rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .main-subtitle {
    display: none;
  }
}

.title-section {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  text-align: center;
  height: 20.625em;
  background-color: white;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .title-section {
    height: 18em;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .title-section {
    height: 10em;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    gap: 6%;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 450px) {
  .title-section {
    height: 10em;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    gap: 4%;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
  }
}

.hamburger-menu {
  display: none;
  margin-top: 0.3em;
  font-size: 7rem;
  color: #707070;
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .hamburger-menu {
    display: block;
    font-size: 5rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 450px) {
  .hamburger-menu {
    display: block;
    font-size: 4rem;
  }
}

.hamburger-menu:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #636060;
}

@use "sass:map";
@use "sass:map";
@use "sass:map";
.navigation-bar {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: row;
          flex-direction: row;
  -ms-flex-pack: distribute;
      justify-content: space-around;
  float: left;
  list-style: none;
  font-size: 2.7rem;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(78, 78, 77, 0.2);
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) and (max-height: 1366px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5) and (hover: none) {
  .navigation-bar {
    font-size: 3.4rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1324px) {
  .navigation-bar {
    font-size: 2.4rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 968px) {
  .navigation-bar {
    font-size: 2.3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .navigation-bar {
    font-size: 2.1rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .navigation-bar {
    display: none;
  }
}

.nav-link-element {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: white;
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
      -ms-flex-positive: 1;
          flex-grow: 1;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 0.4em;
  -webkit-transition: 300ms;
  transition: 300ms;
}

.nav-link-element:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  background-color: rgba(68, 68, 67, 0.2);
}

.nav-link-element-active {
  background-color: rgba(68, 68, 67, 0.2);
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .hero-text-box-container {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
  }
}

.hero-text-box {
  position: absolute;
  -webkit-transform: translate(-10%, 10%);
          transform: translate(-10%, 10%);
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .hero-text-box {
    -webkit-transform: translate(-10%, 10%);
            transform: translate(-10%, 10%);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .hero-text-box {
    -webkit-transform: none;
            transform: none;
  }
}

@media all and (device-width: 768px) and (device-height: 1024px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .hero-text-box {
    -webkit-transform: translate(-10%, -20%);
            transform: translate(-10%, -20%);
  }
}

@media all and (device-width: 1024px) and (device-height: 768px) and (orientation: landscape) {
  .hero-text-box {
    -webkit-transform: translate(-10%, 10%);
            transform: translate(-10%, 10%);
  }
}

  top: 50%;
  left: 10%;

    width: 620px;
  }
}

  color: #7aa6c0;
}

.step-number {
